title: 221 - Alarm Clock Needed
description:
It’s week 2 of being quarantined and the guys are still recording from home. CJ opens up the discussion with the real frustration that some people are experiencing during this pandemic. Frustrated because of misinformation, lack of information, and just not knowing what and who to believe. The conversation shifts into how and why people need to adjust to change during this time. Change isn’t easy and changing against your will is something most of us do not want to do. Today’s podcast reveals the truth about how the guys are dealing with this change and how you can adjust and make the best of the quarantine.
 The Secret to Success Topics:
  [03:00] - Trey’s Comedy Corner
 [04:50] - Quarantine Life
 [17:00] - Frustration
 [26:30] - Podcast Challenge
 [32:00] - The Shift
 [40:00] - Prepare For Change
 [1:02:30] - Hole 14
 [1:18:10] - Ask ET
  Listener Perks:
  The Prescription Album
 Organifi is giving our listeners 20% off of their order just go to www.organifi.com/success. Their superfood green juice powder allows you to get your greens anytime anywhere while on the go.
 Text ET at 313-251-1181 and follow us on IG @S2SPodcast
  Secrets 2 Success:
  Your body is designed to protect you from change.
 Two things in life are inevitable, death and change.
 This is not a physical fight, this is a mental battle.
 Prepare for change before change happens.
 The adjustment is making me adjust.
  Get connected with a network of over 3,500 people who listen to ET, and embodies the work ethic and spirit of ET. To learn more about Breathe University. Subscribe to the podcast via  Apple Podcasts.
